entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow option for DataProtection keys to not be cached #43500
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Feature] Blazor QuickGrid add the ability to be able to export all data or filtered data to a pdf , csv, html #43499
  • FileStreamResult results in sensitive data being logged #43495
  • Support Deprecation Metadata in the API Explorer #43493
  • Blazor Server - NotAuthorized content is shown before Authorization is finished #43492
  • VS 2022 Stuck Launching Angular SPA and Never Redirects #43491
  • Make SystemTextJsonInputFormatter IAsyncEnumerable aware #43489
  • [Blazor] how to disable the [parameter] feature inherit from component? #43486
  • Change argument null exceptions to use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull #43482

Closed

  • What is the application that I have to allow in the firewall for a gRPC hosted in an ASP Core application? #43393
  • Provide documentation to use Owin correctly with ASP.NET Core #39943
    Backlog
  • I am getting a System.NullReferenceError when I am using a .NET MAUI Blazor app #43448
  • Better MSAL support for additional scenarios #38122
    7.0-rc1
  • In Blazor WebAssembly, allow dynamic query string parameters when redirecting to IDP #33784
    7.0-rc1
  • Blazor Webassembly AAD and AAD B2C support improvements #27549
    7.0-rc1
  • Provide a way to set loginHint in Blazor with AAD auth #19925
    7.0-rc1
  • .Net 5 RC2 - Blazor Wasm - AAD B2C SignUpSignIn catch error 'AADB2C90118' to start Password Reset userflow #27119
    Backlog
  • Add support for "prompt="select_user" with WASM / MSAL #32640
    7.0-rc1
  • Support passing more options to WASM AAD auth #32782
    7.0-rc1
  • Blazor Azure ADB2C Authentication popup size does not match content #37365
    7.0-rc1
  • Authentication Failure Doesn't Display Failure Reason #43029
    7.0-rc1
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.ClientAssets - An improvement proposal #42220
    Discussions
  • Publishing a Standalone to linux server with new base path, unable to make it work #43487
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_nodejs #43447
  • RateLimitingMiddleware throws TaskCanceledException #43473
    7.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Update CredScanSuppressions.json #43497
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.Web.Xdt version #43490
    area-infrastructure
  • Cover release/7.0 in our pipelines #43483
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • CanCachePolicy=>AllowsCachingPolicies #43479
    area-security, ask-mode
  • Update MessagePack-CSharp #43474
    8.0-alpha1
  • Update MessagePack-CSharp #43476
    area-blazor, tell-mode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43463
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Don't throw TaskCanceledException in RateLimitingMiddleware #43320
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7274ec1` to `c0e032e` #43458
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1

Updated

  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1961833 #43428
    area-infrastructure
  • Make skipComponentGovernanceDetection a variable #43477
    area-infrastructure
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor
  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove the double dispatch on Windows for IO #43449
    area-runtime
  • Nullable cleanup #43451
